channel.title: Emote tab text?
channel.description:
Ello guys, i'm trying to change the text on the emote tabs.. but i can't find it in client.java :confused:
I've looked in all the java files, n' i can't bloody find it, any ideas? :|
EDIT:: I've foundit, was in texthandler, must've skipped over it. :rolleyes:
